title: Silent Planet
subtitle: A 2D sidescrolling platformer made in 2 weeks
authors: Hrafnkell Baldursson, Steinar Ágúst Steinarsson, Atli Guðmundsson
description: This thrilling 2D sidescrolling platformer was a part of a 3 week game development class in Reykjavik University. We had to come up with our own idea for a game that we could design and develop in 3 weeks. Our idea was a story driven game that would put the player on a foreign planet after crashing his spaceship. The player would need to travel the unknown landscape using a grappling hook to make the gameplay interesting.
